Hi, I'm Juan Hernandez

AI Software Engineer | Data Scientist

Graduate with a dual degree in Computer Engineering and Business Administration (ADE), currently pursuing a Master's in Data Science and Computer Engineering at the University of Granada (UGR), specializing in Data Science and Intelligent Technologies. With hands-on experience in Data and a strong command of English (B2 Cambridge), I focus on developing innovative solutions that combine technical expertise with data-driven insights to create high-quality digital products.

< About Me />

I completed my studies at the University of Granada (UGR), earning a dual degree in Computer Engineering and Business Administration. Currently, I'm pursuing a Master's in Data Science and Computer Engineering, specializing in Data Science and Intelligent Technologies, while working professionally in the field.

I gained valuable hands-on experience during my internship as a Data Engineer, where I worked on data pipelines, ETL processes, and data infrastructure. This experience solidified my passion for working with data and understanding how to transform raw information into actionable insights.

Currently, I work as an AI Engineer Junior at NTT DATA, where I focus on developing AI-powered solutions, building intelligent automation systems, and creating AI agents that streamline business processes. My role allows me to explore cutting-edge technologies in the Artificial Intelligence domain, combining my technical skills with innovative problem-solving.

I am deeply passionate about Artificial Intelligence and its potential to transform industries. From machine learning models to generative AI and intelligent automation, I'm constantly exploring new ways to leverage AI technologies to create efficient, scalable, and impactful solutions. My goal is to continue growing in this exciting field, pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI.
